title: Online Cross-Cultural Collaborative Learning Design: Application of Expansive Learning Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language communication skills and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Emphasizes collaborative project execution and virtual lesson design competencies for language learning in multicultural settings

learning_goals: Explaining at least three language communication strategies reflecting cultural differences through cross-cultural team activities
Revising virtual lesson designs using iterative feedback cycles based on expansive learning theory
Creating and presenting language usage case materials reflecting cultural contexts through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
